trigger.Name: GlobalVar
trigger.script:
AllowSave(false) SetVar("AutoSaveCount", 0) SetRadarUpgrade(0)
CreateNewDummyObject( "metal_plate1", "gt01", -1, -1, CVector(221.715, 257.498, 345.665), Quaternion(0.5168, -0.4830, 0.5248, 0.4736) ) CreateNewDummyObject( "metal_plate1", "gt02", -1, -1, CVector(221.540, 257.476, 355.732), Quaternion(0.5168, -0.4830, 0.5248, 0.4736) ) CreateNewDummyObject( "metal_plate1", "gt03", -1, -1, CVector(221.365, 257.454, 365.799), Quaternion(0.5168, -0.4830, 0.5248, 0.4736) ) TActivate("trGenDestroyed") TActivate("trSpawn01") TActivate("trSpawn02") TActivate("trSpawn03") TActivate("trSpawn04") TActivate("trSpawn05") TActivate("trSpawn06") TActivate("trCoreDestroyed") trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trGenDestroyed
trigger.script: trigger:IncCount() local count = trigger:GetCount() if 6>count then return end CompleteQuest("GenDestroy_Quest") TakeQuest("CoreDestroy_Quest") TActivate("cinGenDestroyedFly") trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trCoreDestroyed
trigger.script: CompleteQuest("CoreDestroy_Quest") TakeQuest("CaveBack_Quest") TDeactivate("trSpawn01") TDeactivate("trSpawn02") TDeactivate("trSpawn03") TDeactivate("trSpawn04") TDeactivate("trSpawn05") TDeactivate("trSpawn06") TActivate("trRunAway") trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trRunAway
trigger.script:
CreateNewDummyObject( "dweller", "Druid1", -1, -1, CVector(107.827, 255.111, 132.116), Quaternion(-0.6881, -0.0179, -0.0191, 0.7251), 0)
getObj("Druid1"):SetNodeAction(AT_STAND1) getObj("Druid1"):SetNextForAnimation(AT_STAND1, -1) local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( true ) Plf:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) Plf:SetThrottle( 0 ) Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( false ) PlayCustomMusic("Sadness1") Fly("dead_body", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 17, 1, 1 ) StartCinematic()
AddCinematicMessage( 12, 1 ) AddCinematicMessage( 13, 1 ) TActivate("cinRunAway")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinRunAway
trigger.script: AddQuestItem("Dead_druid_P") SetCameraBehindPlayerVehicle() getObj("Druid1"):Remove() StopPlayingCustomMusic() TActivate("ToR3M2") trigger:Deactivate()
